subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Last season, Bobby Abreu was the only player in the majors to win a Gold Glove and finish in the top 10 in his league in runs scored, R.B.I., stolen bases and walks.
snippet: Last season, Bobby Abreu was the only player in the majors to win a Gold Glove and finish in the top 10 in his league in runs scored, R.B.I., stolen bases and walks.
